text: He imandarasakala! Tomalokara strai-sbami arau santana-santatisakalara majata kichumana tomalokara satrau; eteke sihamtara bisaye tomaloke satarka thakiba. Yadi tomaloke sihamtaka marjana karai diya, sihamtara dosa-trauti upeksa karaa arau sihamtaka ksama karai diya, tente niscaya allaha ksamasila, parama dayalu
